comments: Anybody who doesn\'t like her is a whiner. She expects us to work and most people don\'t want to. I came back to school at age 39 and she helped me ease my way back in to math. Her class helped me to prepare for college because most of my classes since then have been much easier. VERY sympathetic person and very personable. I cried when I left!

Professor Roberts shouldn\'t even be a PROFESSOR!!! She can not teach,very rude,sarcastic and not caring about her students Why is she still there? I\'ve only been in college for two quarters and I only pray not to get another teacher like her. I had to drop the course, couldn\'t understand a word she was saying, and she didn\'t like answering quest
should not be teaching give wrong information , unclear directions. way to much homework. Truly a disgrace to this school.

She is the worse professor I have ever had in my college career. She is uncaring, not clear on her directions, she can\'t teach. I had to go to outside internet sources to try to understand what she was talking about and to teach myself since she was so bad at it and made no sense. She should not be a college teacher I failed, mostly due to her!
i am slow at math i have to admit. i also know that people drop classes for personal reasons. but when 75% of the class has a failing grade the teacher has to take alot on the blame.
One of the worst teachers I\'ve ever had at Columbus State, she expects her students to fail.
This professor has no interest in her students. No extra credit, tons of HW and very cold and cruel. 6 of 22 students are left for this quarter. She\'s sarcastic and offers very little help.
Does not offer any help, gives you tons and tons of homework, does not accept late work no matter what the excuse is. Does not offer any extra credit.
